      • applyDiscountFactor

        public static java.math.BigDecimal applyDiscountFactor(java.math.BigDecimal price,
                                                       java.math.BigDecimal discountFactor)
        Applies a discount factor to a given price.
        Parameters:
        price - the price to be discounted
        discountFactor - the discount factor to b apply to the price.
        Returns:
        the discounted price = original_price * (1-disount_factor)
